thread.title: Multiple casualties in crane collapse in central Israeli town
thread.title_full: Multiple casualties in crane collapse in central Israeli town

author: JPOST.COM STAFF
title: Multiple casualties in crane collapse in central Israeli town
text:
Multiple casualties in crane collapse in central Israeli town By JPOST.COM STAFF Magen David Adom reports at least 4 hurt, including one in serious condition. Crane collapse in Bat Yam, February 13, 2017. (photo credit:MAGEN DAVID ADOM) 
Multiple people were injured after a crane collapsed at a construction site in the Tel Aviv suburb of Bat Yam on Monday afternoon, according to initial reports. Magen David Adom reported that at least four people were hurt, including one person in serious condition. Two killed, several feared trapped in Tel Aviv construction collapse Emergency crews evacuated an approximately 35-year-old man in serious condition, a moderately-injured man in his 40s whose car was struck by the crane and two people in light condition, including a man in his 40s and a young girl, to nearby hospitals. (Crane collapse in Bat Yam (credit:MDA)) More details on the incident were expected shortly. Relevant to your professional network? Please share on Linkedin Tags:
